thread.title: BRISK FRIDAY, MILDER DAYS AHEAD

author: Johnny Caudle
title: BRISK FRIDAY, MILDER DAYS AHEAD
text:
BRISK FRIDAY, MILDER DAYS AHEAD
A cold and windy Friday eases into a sunnier, warmer weekend, with springlike highs returning by early next week.
Friday: Mostly sunny, with a high near 39. West northwest wind 10 to 15 mph decreasing to 5 to 10 mph in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 30 mph.
Friday Night: Mostly clear, with a low around 26. Calm wind becoming south southeast around 5 mph after midnight.
Saturday: Sunny, with a high near 53. South wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.
Saturday Night: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 36. South wind 5 to 10 mph becoming northwest after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 20 mph.
Sunday: Mostly sunny, with a high near 48. North wind around 5 mph.
Sunday Night: Partly cloudy, with a low around 26. North northeast wind around 5 mph becoming east after midnight.
Monday: Mostly sunny, with a high near 50. South wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.
Monday Night: Partly cloudy, with a low around 37.
Tuesday: A 20 percent chance of showers. Partly sunny, with a high near 53.
Tuesday Night: A 20 percent chance of showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 46.
Almanac for Crossville, Tennessee for December 19
- Normal High Temperature: 47
- Normal Low Temperature: 30
- Record High Temperature: 66 in 1967
- Record Low Temperature: -4 in 1963
- Record Rainfall: 0.60 in 1957
- Record Snowfall: 2.3 in 1954
- Sunrise: 6:46 AM CST
- Sunset: 4:29 PM CST
- Winter Solstice: Sunday, December 21, 2025 at 9:03 AM CST
- Next Full Moon: Saturday, January 3, 2026 at 5:03 AM CST (known as the Wolf Moon; this full moon will also be a supermoon)
- Daylight Saving Time Begins: Sunday, March 8, 2026 at 2:00 AM EDT
Weather information is provided by the National Weather Service in Nashville and Morristown. You can hear the latest forecast on 105.7 The Hog, 94.1 The Vibe (1410 AM), Spirit 101.9, 98.9 The Wolf, and 93.3 The Ranch (580 AM). Stay connected with Weathercaster Johnny Caudle on social media by following him on Facebook, X, Instagram, Bluesky, Mastodon, TikTok, YouTube, and Threads. You can also click here to send him an email.
